LanguageData.FiredBrickFloor.label: fired brick flooring
LanguageData.FiredBrickFloor.description: Fired bricks laid to form a floor. Cheaper than stone bricks but prettier to look at than flagstone, they offer a nice compromise between cost, utility, and appearance.
LanguageData.PorcelainFloor.label: porcelain tile
LanguageData.PorcelainFloor.description: Carefully laid, smooth white porcelain tiles make for an appealing, easy to clear floor.
LanguageData.FineTilePorcelain.label: fine porcelain tile
